import { useState } from "react"; import validation from '../../components/Validation/validation'; const Form = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', image: '', hp: '', attack: '', defense: '', speed: '', weight: '', height: '' }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({ name: '', image: '', hp: '', attack: '', defense: '', speed: '', weight: '', height: '' }) const changeHandler = (event) => { const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; validation({...form, [property]: value}); setForm({...form, [property]: value}) } return (
) } export default Form;
